short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inspect and validate Prebid.js Data such as AdUnits, bids and Consent Data on web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Header Bidding Inspector is adops tool for inspecting and validating header bidding setups. Designed for publishers, ad tech professionals, and marketers by Biddingstack ad platform. it provides an in-depth view of the Prebid.js configuration on any webpage.

Features:

* AdUnits Overview: Easily list all AdUnits on the page to ensure proper setup and detect missing or misconfigured units.
* Bidder Insights: Access comprehensive information on all bidders, including bid requests, responses, prices, winning bids, and latency, helping you evaluate the effectiveness of your header bidding partners.
* Creative Codes: Get a complete list of ad creative codes to ensure the expected content is displayed.
* Consent Data: Check the consent string data to ensure compliance with privacy regulations such as GDPR and CCPA, IAB TCF, GPP.
